title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and replacing the exported jar in the same directory, an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to prevent the out of sync message from appearing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Open a project directory. 
2. Export the project directory as a jar file. 
3. Place the exported jar file in the same project directory. 
4. Overwrite the exported jar file. 
5. Verify if an out of sync message is displayed.
